clinical_study.brief_title: Observation of the Efficacy and Tolerance of Motens速 (Lacidipine) in Patients With Essential Hypertension
clinical_study.official_title: Observation of the Efficacy and Tolerance of Motens速 (Lacidipine) in Patients With Essential Hypertension, Under Normal Conditions Compared With an Open Clinical Trial

brief_summary.textblock: Study of the efficacy and tolerance of Motens速 (lacidipine) in patients with essential hypertension. To obtain information on the dosage used in practice and the tolerance at the start of treatment (12 weeks)

primary_outcome.measure: Assessment of efficacy by the investigator on a 4-point verbal rating scale based on changes in blood pressure
primary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 12 weeks after start of drug administration

primary_outcome.measure: Assessment of tolerability by investigator on a 4-point verbal rating scale
primary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 12 weeks after start of drug administration

primary_outcome.measure: Number of patients with adverse events
primary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 12 weeks after start of drug administration

study_pop.textblock: Patients with essential Hypertension recruited by General practicioners, cardiologists and specialists in internal medicine in non-Hospital practice

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
Non-hospitalised patients of both sexes aged 18 years or more with essential hypertension requiring treatment according to the recommendations of the German League for Hypertension
Exclusion Criteria:
Patients who had the contraindications listed in the product information (the case report file contained a copy of the product information)
